text:
LOS 13.e
Price-based indicators include moving averages, Bollinger bands, and momentum
oscillators such as the Relative Strength Index, moving average convergence/divergence
lines, rate-of-change oscillators, and stochastic oscillators. These indicators are
commonly used to identify changes in price trends, as well as “overbought” markets that
are likely to decrease in the near term and “oversold” markets that are likely to increase
in the near term.
